attributes.action: say no to the minimum alcohol price proposed by Sir Liam Donaldson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already get ripped off enough in this country, upping the price on alcohol will not stop people from buying less, they will just pay more for it. We request that you do put in place a minimum price for alcohol.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
